name: Bat-Mum
description:
Your newborn bat puppies are hungry. It's your job as their mom to feed them!

Luckily, the primates of the jungle have accidentally dropped a few bananas from their recent shipment. Now, that's no monkey business. Fly, glide and use your echolocation to look for the bananas and bring them to your babies. But beware: the monkeys will try to stop you!

A submission for bat-themed the 'LM0B Beginners Game Jam #18'

Controls

Space - tap to fly / hold to glide
RMB - use echolocation
